description: Historically, Kink.com members LOVE to see Ariel X suffer in bondage and to the strong hand and sharp tongue of a skilled Domme. She gives in so perfectly and so willingly it's very hard to resist slapping your hand across her face (or for me slapping sticky pads all over her body!) Today, I give her over to the wickedly nasty Lorelei Lee. Tied in a strenuous one leg up position Ariel X is already in for a tough time. To add difficulty to an her already stressful state, copper pipes are dangled at just the right hight to delicately brush her sensitive bits and pieces. Lucky for us, Ariel X within the ropes and under electrosex leads to a good time for all!
title: Ariel X is BACK!!
